esim.esim_profile_number_tips: The sizes of eSIM profiles sold in different stores are different, so the number of profiles written to eSIM will also vary.
esim.seed_profile_tips: Seed profiles are a free service provided by GL.iNet. You can use the seed profile data to download other profiles or to perform initial tests, and you can see how much data it has left and when it expires. If the free data in the seed profile runs out or expires, you can also use an Ethernet or Repeater connection to the Internet to download additional profiles.
esim.add_esim_profile_tips: Most of eSIM can only download and add once
esim.name: Name
esim.top_up_title: Scan the QR code to top up
esim.insert_physical_card_tips: Please follow the picture to insert the eSIM physical card.
esim.support_tips: For additional help, reach out to support at {addr}.
esim.invalid_activation_code_msg: invalid QR code or activation code
esim.order_physical_card_tips: Click {link} to order an eSIM Physical Card if required.
esim.check_insert_physical_esim_card_tips: Please check the diagram and insert your physical eSIM card properly.
esim.get_card_tips: Don't have one? Select your region below to get a compatible card.
esim.delete_esim_profile_tips: If you delete the eSIM profile, it may not be downloaded again. Are you sure you want to delete?
